title: Skill titles
data:
***Version [0.32](/0.32 "0.32")**: This article is up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*.*

Your character will be given a **skill title** based on their current skill set. To determine the title, a character's skills are placed into five tiers: Lvl 1-7, 8-14, 15-20, 21-26, and 27. Your character's title is determined by their highest skill -- any time a different skill surpasses your current highest skill, your title will change to reflect it. Your title will also change when your current highest skill reaches a new tier. The first skill to reach level 27 will determine your character's final title.

| **Skill**                                                | **Level 1-7** | **Level 8-14**          | **Level 15-20**    | **Level 21-26**          | **Level 27**                        |
| -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- | ----------------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------ | ----------------------------------- |
| **[Fighting](/Fighting "Fighting")**                     | Trooper       | Fighter                 | Warrior            | Slayer                   | Conqueror                           |
| **[Axes](/Axes "Axes")**                                 | Chopper       | Cleaver                 | Severer            | Executioner              | Axe Maniac                          |
| **[Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails")** | Cudgeler      | Basher                  | Bludgeoner         | Shatterer                | Skullcrusher                        |
| **[Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")**                     | Poker         | Spear-Bearer            | Impaler            | Phalangite               | Foo Porcupine                       |
| **[Staves](/Staves "Staves")**                           | Twirler       | Cruncher                | Stickfighter       | Pulveriser               | Chief of Staff                      |
| **[Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat")\*** | Ruffian/Insei | Grappler/Martial Artist | Brawler/Black Belt | Wrestler/Sensei          | Fooweight\*\* Champion/Grand Master |
| **[Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")**         | Cutter        | Slicer                  | Swashbuckler       | Cutthroat                | Politician                          |
| **[Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")**            | Slasher       | Carver                  | Fencer             | Foo Blade                | Swordmaster                         |
| **[Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")**   | Shooter       | Skirmisher              | Marksfoo           | Crack Shot               | Merry Foo                           |
| **[Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")**                     | Chucker       | Thrower                 | Deadly Accurate    | Hawkeye                  | Foo Ballista                        |
| **[Armour](/Armour "Armour")**                           | Covered       | Protected               | Tortoise           | Impregnable              | Invulnerable                        |
| **[Dodging](/Dodging "Dodging")**                        | Ducker        | Nimble                  | Spry               | Acrobat                  | Intangible                          |
| **[Shields](/Shields "Shields")**                        | Shield-Bearer | Blocker                 | Peltast            | Hoplite                  | Foo Barricade                       |
| **[Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting")**         | Magician      | Thaumaturge             | Eclecticist        | Sorcerer                 | Archmage                            |
| **[Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")**         | Conjurer      | Destroyer               | Devastator         | Ruinous                  | Annihilator                         |
| **[Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes")**                              | Vexing        | Jinx                    | Bewitcher          | Maledictor               | Spellbinder                         |
| **[Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings")**               | Caller        | Summoner                | Convoker           | Worldbinder/Demonologist | Planerender/Hellbinder\*\*\*\*\*    |
| **[Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")**               | Grave Robber  | Reanimator              | Necromancer        | Thanatomancer            | Foo of Death\*\*\*\*\*\*            |
| **[Translocations](/Translocations "Translocations")**   | Grasshopper   | Placeless Foo           | Blinker            | Portalist                | Plane Walker\*\*\*                  |
| **[Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic")**               | Firebug       | Arsonist                | Scorcher           | Pyromancer               | Infernalist                         |
| **[Ice Magic](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic")**                  | Chiller       | Frost Mage              | Gelid              | Cryomancer               | Englaciator                         |
| **[Air Magic](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")**                  | Gusty         | Zephyrmancer            | Stormcaller        | Cloud Mage               | Meteorologist                       |
| **[Earth Magic](/Earth_Magic "Earth Magic")**            | Digger        | Geomancer               | Earth Mage         | Metallomancer            | Petrodigitator                      |
| **[Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy")**                        | Apothecary    | Toxicologist            | Hermetic           | Philosopher              | Quintessent                         |
| **[Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations")**\*\*\*\*    | Unbeliever    | Agnostic                | Dissident          | Heretic                  | Apostate                            |
| **[Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations")**               | Charlatan     | Prestidigitator         | Fetichist          | Evocator                 | Ex Machina                          |
| **[Shapeshifting](/Shapeshifting "Shapeshifting")**      | Changeling    | Mimic                   | Metamorph          | Skinwalker               | Shapeless Foo                       |
| **[Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth")**                        | Sneak         | Covert                  | Unseen             | Imperceptible            | Ninja                               |

*\* Title determined by whether your STR or DEX is higher.*

*\*\* Title determined by (upper) body size: Weightless (Djinn), Fly (Spriggans), Feather (Kobolds and Tengu), Light (Deep Elves), Middle (Humans and everyone else not included in other categories), Cruiser (species with torso smaller than lower body, ie. Nagas and Armataurs), and Heavy (Oni and Trolls).*

*\*\*\* Title determined by method of locomotion. [Octopode](/Octopode "Octopode"): Plane Wriggler; [Tengu](/Tengu "Tengu"): Plane Glider; [Naga](/Naga "Naga"): Plane Slitherer; [Vine Stalker](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker"): Plane Stalker, [Armataur](/Armataur "Armataur"): Plane Roller.*

*\*\*\*\* The invocations titles above will be used if the character is currently following no [god](/God "God"). A skilled Invocations-user will otherwise use the title assigned by their god and [piety](/Piety "Piety") level, such as "Missionary" for 3-star [Beogh](/Beogh "Beogh"). A table for this can be found below.*

*\*\*\*\*\* Title determined by whether or not you worship an evil god.*

*\*\*\*\*\*\* [Demigods](/Demigod "Demigod") get the title "God of Death".*

## Invocations Titles

Titles for the [invocations](/Invocations "Invocations") skill depend on piety level and god being worshipped. Gods which don't require training invocations still have titles based on them, although will mostly only be encountered when playing as a [Gnoll](/Gnoll "Gnoll").

| **God**                                                   | **Penance**              | **......**            | **\*.....**             | **\*\*....**         | **\*\*\*...**            | **\*\*\*\*..**     | **\*\*\*\*\*.**        | **\*\*\*\*\*\***             |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ | --------------------- | ----------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------------ | ---------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| **[Ashenzari](/Ashenzari "Ashenzari")**                   | Star-crossed\*           | Cursed                | Initiated               | Seer                 | Oracle                   | Illuminatus        | Prince of Secrets      | Omniscient                   |
| **[Beogh](/Beogh "Beogh")**                               | Apostate                 | Convert               | Proselytiser            | Priest               | Missionary               | Evangelist         | Unifier                | Messiah                      |
| **[Cheibriados](/Cheibriados "Cheibriados")**             | Hasty                    | Sluggish Foo          | Deliberate              | Unhurried            | Contemplative            | Epochal            | Timeless               | Fooish Aeon                  |
| **[Dithmenos](/Dithmenos "Dithmenos")**                   | Conspicuous\*            | Nocturnal             | Bump in the Night       | Thespian             | Tenebrous                | Puppet Master      | Walking\*\*\* Midnight | Who Hides the Stars          |
| **[Elyvilon](/Elyvilon "Elyvilon")**                      | Sinner                   | Practitioner          | Comforter               | Caregiver            | Mender                   | Pacifist           | Purifying Foo          | Bringer of Life              |
| **[Fedhas](/Fedhas "Fedhas")**                            | Walking\*\*\* Fertilizer | Fungal                | Green Foo               | Cultivator           | Fruitful                 | Photosynthesist    | Green Death            | Force of Nature              |
| **[Hepliaklqana](/Hepliaklqana "Hepliaklqana")**          | Damnatio Memoriae\*      | Hazy                  | Fooish Child\*\*\*\*    | Storyteller          | Brooding                 | Anamnesiscian      | Grand Scion            | Unforgettable                |
| **[Ignis](/Ignis "Ignis")**                               | Extinguished\*           | Last Ember            | Glowing Coal            | Thurifer             | Hearthfire               | Furnace            | Raging Flame           | Inferno                      |
| **[Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva")**                               | Scum                     | Squelcher             | Ooze                    | Jelly                | Slime Creature           | Dissolving Foo     | Blob                   | Royal Jelly                  |
| **[Kikubaaqudgha](/Kikubaaqudgha "Kikubaaqudgha")\*\***   | Tormented\*              | Purveyor of Pain      | Pupil of Sorrows        | Merchant of Misery   | Scholar of Souls         | Artisan of Death   | Demagogue of Despair   | Lord of Darkness             |
| **[Lugonu](/Lugonu "Lugonu")**                            | Pure\*                   | Abyss-Baptised        | Unweaver                | Distorting Foo       | Agent of Entropy         | Schismatic         | Envoy of Void          | Corrupter of Planes          |
| **[Makhleb](/Makhleb "Makhleb")**                         | Orderly\*                | Spawn of Chaos        | Disciple of Destruction | Fanfare of Bloodshed | Fiendish                 | Demolition Foo     | Pandemonic             | Champion of Chaos            |
| **[Nemelex Xobeh](/Nemelex_Xobeh "Nemelex Xobeh")**       | Unlucky Foo\*            | Pannier               | Jester                  | Fortune-Teller       | Soothsayer               | Magus              | Cardsharp              | Hand of Fortune              |
| **[Okawaru](/Okawaru "Okawaru")**                         | Coward                   | Struggler             | Combatant               | Foo-at-Arms          | Knight                   | Myrmidon           | Warmonger              | Victor of a Thousand Battles |
| **[Qazlal](/Qazlal "Qazlal")**                            | Unspoiled\*              | Fooish Mishap         | Lightning Rod           | Fooish Disaster      | Eye of the Storm         | Fooish Catastrophe | Fooish Cataclysm       | End of an Era                |
| **[Ru](/Ru "Ru")**                                        | Sleeper\*                | Questioner            | Initiate                | Seeker of Truth      | Walker\*\*\* of the Path | Lifter of the Veil | Transcendent           | Drop of Water                |
| **[Sif Muna](/Sif_Muna "Sif Muna")**                      | Ignorant\*               | Disciple              | Student                 | Adept                | Scribe                   | Scholar            | Sage                   | Genius of the Arcane         |
| **[Trog](/Trog "Trog")**                                  | Puny                     | Troglodyte            | Angry Troglodyte        | Frenzied             | Foo of Prey              | Rampant            | Wild Foo               | Bane of Scribes              |
| **[Vehumet](/Vehumet "Vehumet")**                         | Meek\*                   | Sorcerer's Apprentice | Scholar of Destruction  | Caster of Ruination  | Traumaturge              | Battlemage         | Warlock                | Luminary of Lethal Lore      |
| **[Wu Jian](/Wu_Jian "Wu Jian")**                         | Wooden Rat\*             | Young Dog             | Young Crane             | Young Tiger          | Young Dragon             | Red Sash           | Golden Sash            | Sifu                         |
| **[Yredelemnul](/Yredelemnul "Yredelemnul")**             | Traitor                  | Torchbearer           | Despoiler               | Black Crusader       | Fallen Foo               | Harbinger of Doom  | Inexorable Tide        | Bringer of Blasphemy         |
| **[Zin](/Zin "Zin")**                                     | Blasphemer               | Anchorite             | Apologist               | Pious                | Devout                   | Orthodox           | Immaculate             | Bringer of Law               |
| **[the Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One")** | Honourless               | Acolyte               | Righteous               | Unflinching          | Holy Warrior             | Exorcist           | Demon Slayer           | Bringer of Light             |

*\* These titles are unreachable, because some gods don't have conducts and cannot place current worshippers under penance.*

*\*\* For Kikubaaqudgha, having Necromancy as the highest skill will also result in these titles.*

*\*\*\* Title determined by method of locomotion.*

*\*\*\*\* Many species use a word other than child, [Felid](/Felid "Felid")="Kitten", [Tengu](/Tengu "Tengu")="Chick", [Gnoll](/Gnoll "Gnoll") or [Armataur](/Armataur "Armataur")="Pup", [Formicid](/Formicid "Formicid")="Larva", [Minotaur](/Minotaur "Minotaur")="Calf", [Barachi](/Barachi "Barachi")="Tadpole", [Octopode](/Octopode "Octopode")="Fry".*

Since Gozag has no piety system, its Invocations titles work off current amount of gold:

| **God**                     | **Penance**  | **0-99 gold** | **100-499 gold** | **500-999 gold** | **1000-4999 gold** | **5000-9999 gold** | **10000-49999 gold** | **50000+ gold** |
| --------------------------- | ------------ | ------------- | ---------------- | ---------------- | ------------------ | ------------------ | -------------------- | --------------- |
| **[Gozag](/Gozag "Gozag")** | Profligate\* | Pauper        | Entrepreneur     | Capitalist       | Rich               | Opulent            | Tycoon               | Plutocrat       |

Since Uskayaw has a different piety gain system, its Invocations titles work off Invocations skill:

| **God**                           | **Penance** | **Level 0-7** | **Level 8-11** | **Level 12-15** | **Level 16-19** | **Level 20-23** | **Level 24-26** | **Level 27**             |
| --------------------------------- | ----------- | ------------- | -------------- | --------------- | --------------- | --------------- | --------------- | ------------------------ |
| **[Uskayaw](/Uskayaw "Uskayaw")** | Prude\*     | Wallflower    | Party-goer     | Dancer          | Impassioned     | Rapturous       | Ecstatic        | Rhythm of Life and Death |

Since [Xom](/Xom "Xom") follows no piety system and is utterly unpredictable, its followers are given the same title regardless of interest:

| **God**               | **Any amount of [Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations")** |
| --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Xom](/Xom "Xom")** | Toy                                                         |

## Custom Titles

Certain species/skill combinations result in custom titles:

- [Armataur](/Armataur "Armataur") + 27 Polearms = "Prickly [Pangolin](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pangolin)"
- [Armataur](/Armataur "Armataur") + 27 Invocations + [Good god](/Good_god "Good god") = "Holy Roller"
- [Armataur](/Armataur "Armataur") + 27 Invocations + [Qazlal](/Qazlal "Qazlal") = "Rolling Thunder"
- [Barachi](/Barachi "Barachi") + Any level of Invocations + No God = "God-Hated"
- [Coglin](/Coglin "Coglin") + 27 Invocations + [Fedhas](/Fedhas "Fedhas") = "Cobgoblin"
- [Coglin](/Coglin "Coglin") + 27 Armour = "Iron Golem"
- [Coglin](/Coglin "Coglin") + 27 Spellcasting = "Cogmind"
- [Deep Elf](/Deep_Elf "Deep Elf") + 27 Short Blades = "[Blademaster](/Deep_elf_blademaster "Deep elf blademaster")"
- [Deep Elf](/Deep_Elf "Deep Elf") + 27 Ranged Weapons = "[Master Archer](/Deep_elf_master_archer "Deep elf master archer")"
- [Demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn") + 27 Invocations + [Evil](/Evil "Evil") god = "[Blood Saint](/Demonspawn_blood_saint "Demonspawn blood saint")"
- [Djinni](/Djinni "Djinni") + 27 Spellcasting = "Wishgranter"
- [Djinni](/Djinni "Djinni") + 27 Fire Magic = "Smokeless Flame"
- [Djinni](/Djinni "Djinni") + 27 Ice Magic = "[Marid](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marid)"
- [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") + 27 Hexes = "[Faerie Dragon](/Faerie_Dragon_Scales "Faerie Dragon Scales")"
- [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") + 27 Air Magic = "[Storm Dragon](/Storm_dragon "Storm dragon")"
- [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") + 27 Earth Magic = "[Iron Dragon](/Iron_dragon "Iron dragon")"
- [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") + 27 Fire Magic = "[Fire Dragon](/Fire_dragon "Fire dragon")"
- [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") + 27 Ice Magic = "[Ice Dragon](/Ice_dragon "Ice dragon")"
- [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") + 27 Alchemy = "[Swamp Dragon](/Swamp_dragon "Swamp dragon")"
- [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") + 27 Invocations + Good god = "[Pearl Dragon](/Pearl_dragon "Pearl dragon")"
- [Felid](/Felid "Felid") + Unarmed Combat = "Scratcher", "Gouger", "Ripper", "Eviscerator", "[Sabretooth](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smilodon)"
- [Formicid](/Formicid "Formicid") + 27 Translocations = "Teletunneler"
- [Gargoyle](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle") + 27 Invocations + [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva") = "[Rockslime](/Rockslime "Rockslime")"
- [Gargoyle](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle") + 27 Fire Magic = "Molten"
- [Ghoul](/Ghoul "Ghoul") + 27 Fire Magic = "[Searing Wretch](/Searing_wretch "Searing wretch")"
- [Human](/Human "Human") + 27 Fighting + [Makhleb](/Makhleb "Makhleb") = "[Hell Knight](/Hell_knight "Hell knight")"
- [Merfolk](/Merfolk "Merfolk") + 27 Long Blades = "[Swordfish](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swordfish)"
- [Mummy](/Mummy "Mummy") + 27 Unarmed Combat = "Pharaoh"
- [Mummy](/Mummy "Mummy") + 27 Fire Magic = "Highly Combustible"
- [Mummy](/Mummy "Mummy") + 27 Invocations + [Nemelex Xobeh](/Nemelex_Xobeh "Nemelex Xobeh") = "[Forbidden One](https://yugipedia.com/wiki/Exodia_the_Forbidden_One)"
- [Mummy](/Mummy "Mummy") + 27 Invocations + [Uskayaw](/Uskayaw "Uskayaw") = "[Necrodancer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crypt_of_the_NecroDancer)"
- [Mummy](/Mummy "Mummy") + 27 Invocations + [Gozag](/Gozag "Gozag") = "[Royal Mummy](/Royal_mummy "Royal mummy")"
- [Octopode](/Octopode "Octopode") + 27 Unarmed Combat = "Crusher"
- [Spriggan](/Spriggan "Spriggan") + 27 Necromancy = "[Petite Mort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/La_petite_mort)"
- [Spriggan](/Spriggan "Spriggan") + 21 or more Shields = "[Defender](/Spriggan_defender "Spriggan defender")"
- [Troll](/Troll "Troll") + 21 or more Conjurations = "Wallbreaker"
- [Troll](/Troll "Troll") + 27 Armour = "[Iron Troll](/Iron_troll "Iron troll")"
- [Vine Stalker](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker") + 27 Necromancy = "[Corpseflower](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carrion_flower)"
- [Vine Stalker](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker") + 27 Invocations + [Nemelex Xobeh](/Nemelex_Xobeh "Nemelex Xobeh") = "[Black Lotus](https://gatherer.wizards.com/pages/card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=600)"
- [Vine Stalker](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker") + 27 Invocations + [Dithmenos](/Dithmenos "Dithmenos") = "Nightshade"

## History

- Prior to [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), certain gods had different Invocations titles:

  - [Yredelemnul](/Yredelemnul "Yredelemnul") did not use a standard piety system, so its titles were based on Invocations skill. These titles were Traitor (penance), Tainted (0-7), Torchbearer (8-11), Fey \<foo> (12-15), Black Crusader (16-19), Sculptor of Flesh (20-23), Harbinger of Death (24-26), Grim Reaper (27).
  - [Beogh](/Beogh "Beogh")'s titles were Apostate, Messenger, Proselytiser, Priest, Missionary, Evangelist, Apostle, and Messiah.
  - [Dithmenos](/Dithmenos "Dithmenos")' titles were Ember, Gloomy, Darkened, Extinguished, Caliginous, Umbral, Hand of Shadow, and Eternal Night.
  - [Kikubaaqudgha](/Kikubaaqudgha "Kikubaaqudgha")'s titles were Tormented, Purveyor of Pain, Scholar of Death, Merchant of Misery, Artisan of Death, Dealer of Despair, Black Sun, and Lord of Darkness.

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), 27 Evocations gave the "Talismancer" title.

* * Also, you could get the following custom titles while playing as a [Meteoran](/Meteoran "Meteoran"):

    - - 27 Maces & Flails = "[Morning](/Morningstar "Morningstar")/[Evening](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") Star" (based on time of day)
      - 27 Ranged Weapons = "Shooting Star"
      - 27 Air Magic = "Meteorite"
      - 27 Earth Magic = "Rock Star"
      - 27 Translocations = "Black Hole"
      - 27 Invocations + [Dithmenos](/Dithmenos "Dithmenos") = "[Starry Night](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Starry_Night)"
      - 27 Invocations + [Zin](/Zin "Zin") = "[Silver Star](/Silver_star "Silver star")"
      - 27 Invocations + [Lugonu](/Lugonu "Lugonu") = "[Wretched Star](/Wretched_star "Wretched star")" (briefly present in [trunk](/Trunk "Trunk"))

  * And one title from an [Ogre](/Ogre "Ogre"):
    - Any level of spellcasting = [Ogre mage](/Ogre_mage "Ogre mage")

  * Additionally, a few species-specific "Fooish Child" titles were added in 0.31.

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), [Nagas](/Naga "Naga") had different Walking titles as they slid instead of slither.

Removed skill titles:

| **Skill**                                             | **Level 1-7** | **Level 8-14** | **Level 15-20** | **Level 21-26** | **Level 27**   |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------- | -------------- | --------------- | --------------- | -------------- |
| **[Traps & Doors](/Traps_%26_Doors "Traps & Doors")** | Scout         | Disarmer       | Vigilant        | Perceptive      | Dungeon Master |
| **[Stabbing](/Stabbing "Stabbing")**                  | Miscreant     | Blackguard     | Backstabber     | Cutthroat       | Politician     |
| **[Charms](/Charms "Charms")**                        | Charmwright   | Infuser        | Anointer        | Gracecrafter    | Miracle Worker |
| **[Bows](/Bows "Bows")**                              | Shooter       | Archer         | Marksfoo        | Crack Shot      | Merry Foo      |
| **[Crossbows](/Crossbows "Crossbows")**               | Bolt Thrower  | Quickloader    | Sharpshooter    | Sniper          | Foo Arbalest   |
| **[Slings](/Slings "Slings")**                        | Vandal        | Slinger        | Whirler         | Slingshot       | Foo Catapult   |
| **[Transmutation](/Transmutation "Transmutation")**   | Changer       | Transmogrifier | Alchemist       | Malleable       | Shapeless Foo  |
| **[Poison Magic](/Poison_Magic "Poison Magic")**      | Stinger       | Tainter        | Polluter        | Contaminator    | Envenomancer   |

Removed Invocations titles:

| **God**                                | **Penance** | **......** | **\*.....** | **\*\*....** | **\*\*\*...** | **\*\*\*\*..** | **\*\*\*\*\*.** | **\*\*\*\*\*\*** |
| -------------------------------------- | ----------- | ---------- | ----------- | ------------ | ------------- | -------------- | --------------- | ---------------- |
| **[Pakellas](/Pakellas "Pakellas")\*** | Reactionary | Apprentice | Inquisitive | Experimenter | Inventor      | Pioneer        | Brilliant       | Grand Gadgeteer  |

*\* For Pakellas, these titles were given when [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") was the highest skill.*
html:
Skill titles

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.32: This article is up to date for the latest stable release of Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup.

Your character will be given a skill title based on their current skill set. To determine the title, a character's skills are placed into five tiers: Lvl 1-7, 8-14, 15-20, 21-26, and 27. Your character's title is determined by their highest skill -- any time a different skill surpasses your current highest skill, your title will change to reflect it. Your title will also change when your current highest skill reaches a new tier. The first skill to reach level 27 will determine your character's final title.

Skill Level 1-7 Level 8-14 Level 15-20 Level 21-26 Level 27
Fighting Trooper Fighter Warrior Slayer Conqueror
Axes Chopper Cleaver Severer Executioner Axe Maniac
Maces & Flails Cudgeler Basher Bludgeoner Shatterer Skullcrusher
Polearms Poker Spear-Bearer Impaler Phalangite Foo Porcupine
Staves Twirler Cruncher Stickfighter Pulveriser Chief of Staff
Unarmed Combat* Ruffian/Insei Grappler/Martial Artist Brawler/Black Belt Wrestler/Sensei Fooweight** Champion/Grand Master
Short Blades Cutter Slicer Swashbuckler Cutthroat Politician
Long Blades Slasher Carver Fencer Foo Blade Swordmaster
Ranged Weapons Shooter Skirmisher Marksfoo Crack Shot Merry Foo
Throwing Chucker Thrower Deadly Accurate Hawkeye Foo Ballista
Armour Covered Protected Tortoise Impregnable Invulnerable
Dodging Ducker Nimble Spry Acrobat Intangible
Shields Shield-Bearer Blocker Peltast Hoplite Foo Barricade
Spellcasting Magician Thaumaturge Eclecticist Sorcerer Archmage
Conjurations Conjurer Destroyer Devastator Ruinous Annihilator
Hexes Vexing Jinx Bewitcher Maledictor Spellbinder
Summonings Caller Summoner Convoker Worldbinder/Demonologist Planerender/Hellbinder*****
Necromancy Grave Robber Reanimator Necromancer Thanatomancer Foo of Death******
Translocations Grasshopper Placeless Foo Blinker Portalist Plane Walker***
Fire Magic Firebug Arsonist Scorcher Pyromancer Infernalist
Ice Magic Chiller Frost Mage Gelid Cryomancer Englaciator
Air Magic Gusty Zephyrmancer Stormcaller Cloud Mage Meteorologist
Earth Magic Digger Geomancer Earth Mage Metallomancer Petrodigitator
Alchemy Apothecary Toxicologist Hermetic Philosopher Quintessent
Invocations**** Unbeliever Agnostic Dissident Heretic Apostate
Evocations Charlatan Prestidigitator Fetichist Evocator Ex Machina
Shapeshifting Changeling Mimic Metamorph Skinwalker Shapeless Foo
Stealth Sneak Covert Unseen Imperceptible Ninja

* Title determined by whether your STR or DEX is higher.

** Title determined by (upper) body size: Weightless (Djinn), Fly (Spriggans), Feather (Kobolds and Tengu), Light (Deep Elves), Middle (Humans and everyone else not included in other categories), Cruiser (species with torso smaller than lower body, ie. Nagas and Armataurs), and Heavy (Oni and Trolls).

*** Title determined by method of locomotion. Octopode: Plane Wriggler; Tengu: Plane Glider; Naga: Plane Slitherer; Vine Stalker: Plane Stalker, Armataur: Plane Roller.

**** The invocations titles above will be used if the character is currently following no god. A skilled Invocations-user will otherwise use the title assigned by their god and piety level, such as "Missionary" for 3-star Beogh. A table for this can be found below.

***** Title determined by whether or not you worship an evil god.

****** Demigods get the title "God of Death".

Invocations Titles

Titles for the invocations skill depend on piety level and god being worshipped. Gods which don't require training invocations still have titles based on them, although will mostly only be encountered when playing as a Gnoll.

God Penance ...... *..... **.... ***... ****.. *****. ******
Ashenzari Star-crossed* Cursed Initiated Seer Oracle Illuminatus Prince of Secrets Omniscient
Beogh Apostate Convert Proselytiser Priest Missionary Evangelist Unifier Messiah
Cheibriados Hasty Sluggish Foo Deliberate Unhurried Contemplative Epochal Timeless Fooish Aeon
Dithmenos Conspicuous* Nocturnal Bump in the Night Thespian Tenebrous Puppet Master Walking*** Midnight Who Hides the Stars
Elyvilon Sinner Practitioner Comforter Caregiver Mender Pacifist Purifying Foo Bringer of Life
Fedhas Walking*** Fertilizer Fungal Green Foo Cultivator Fruitful Photosynthesist Green Death Force of Nature
Hepliaklqana Damnatio Memoriae* Hazy Fooish Child**** Storyteller Brooding Anamnesiscian Grand Scion Unforgettable
Ignis Extinguished* Last Ember Glowing Coal Thurifer Hearthfire Furnace Raging Flame Inferno
Jiyva Scum Squelcher Ooze Jelly Slime Creature Dissolving Foo Blob Royal Jelly
Kikubaaqudgha** Tormented* Purveyor of Pain Pupil of Sorrows Merchant of Misery Scholar of Souls Artisan of Death Demagogue of Despair Lord of Darkness
Lugonu Pure* Abyss-Baptised Unweaver Distorting Foo Agent of Entropy Schismatic Envoy of Void Corrupter of Planes
Makhleb Orderly* Spawn of Chaos Disciple of Destruction Fanfare of Bloodshed Fiendish Demolition Foo Pandemonic Champion of Chaos
Nemelex Xobeh Unlucky Foo* Pannier Jester Fortune-Teller Soothsayer Magus Cardsharp Hand of Fortune
Okawaru Coward Struggler Combatant Foo-at-Arms Knight Myrmidon Warmonger Victor of a Thousand Battles
Qazlal Unspoiled* Fooish Mishap Lightning Rod Fooish Disaster Eye of the Storm Fooish Catastrophe Fooish Cataclysm End of an Era
Ru Sleeper* Questioner Initiate Seeker of Truth Walker*** of the Path Lifter of the Veil Transcendent Drop of Water
Sif Muna Ignorant* Disciple Student Adept Scribe Scholar Sage Genius of the Arcane
Trog Puny Troglodyte Angry Troglodyte Frenzied Foo of Prey Rampant Wild Foo Bane of Scribes
Vehumet Meek* Sorcerer's Apprentice Scholar of Destruction Caster of Ruination Traumaturge Battlemage Warlock Luminary of Lethal Lore
Wu Jian Wooden Rat* Young Dog Young Crane Young Tiger Young Dragon Red Sash Golden Sash Sifu
Yredelemnul Traitor Torchbearer Despoiler Black Crusader Fallen Foo Harbinger of Doom Inexorable Tide Bringer of Blasphemy
Zin Blasphemer Anchorite Apologist Pious Devout Orthodox Immaculate Bringer of Law
the Shining One Honourless Acolyte Righteous Unflinching Holy Warrior Exorcist Demon Slayer Bringer of Light

* These titles are unreachable, because some gods don't have conducts and cannot place current worshippers under penance.

** For Kikubaaqudgha, having Necromancy as the highest skill will also result in these titles.

*** Title determined by method of locomotion.

**** Many species use a word other than child, Felid="Kitten", Tengu="Chick", Gnoll or Armataur="Pup", Formicid="Larva", Minotaur="Calf", Barachi="Tadpole", Octopode="Fry".


Since Gozag has no piety system, its Invocations titles work off current amount of gold:

God Penance 0-99 gold 100-499 gold 500-999 gold 1000-4999 gold 5000-9999 gold 10000-49999 gold 50000+ gold
Gozag Profligate* Pauper Entrepreneur Capitalist Rich Opulent Tycoon Plutocrat

Since Uskayaw has a different piety gain system, its Invocations titles work off Invocations skill:

God Penance Level 0-7 Level 8-11 Level 12-15 Level 16-19 Level 20-23 Level 24-26 Level 27
Uskayaw Prude* Wallflower Party-goer Dancer Impassioned Rapturous Ecstatic Rhythm of Life and Death

Since Xom follows no piety system and is utterly unpredictable, its followers are given the same title regardless of interest:

God Any amount of Invocations
Xom Toy

Custom Titles

Certain species/skill combinations result in custom titles:

  • Armataur + 27 Polearms = "Prickly Pangolin"
  • Armataur + 27 Invocations + Good god = "Holy Roller"
  • Armataur + 27 Invocations + Qazlal = "Rolling Thunder"
  • Barachi + Any level of Invocations + No God = "God-Hated"
  • Coglin + 27 Invocations + Fedhas = "Cobgoblin"
  • Coglin + 27 Armour = "Iron Golem"
  • Coglin + 27 Spellcasting = "Cogmind"
  • Deep Elf + 27 Short Blades = "Blademaster"
  • Deep Elf + 27 Ranged Weapons = "Master Archer"
  • Demonspawn + 27 Invocations + Evil god = "Blood Saint"
  • Djinni + 27 Spellcasting = "Wishgranter"
  • Djinni + 27 Fire Magic = "Smokeless Flame"
  • Djinni + 27 Ice Magic = "Marid"
  • Draconian + 27 Hexes = "Faerie Dragon"
  • Draconian + 27 Air Magic = "Storm Dragon"
  • Draconian + 27 Earth Magic = "Iron Dragon"
  • Draconian + 27 Fire Magic = "Fire Dragon"
  • Draconian + 27 Ice Magic = "Ice Dragon"
  • Draconian + 27 Alchemy = "Swamp Dragon"
  • Draconian + 27 Invocations + Good god = "Pearl Dragon"
  • Felid + Unarmed Combat = "Scratcher", "Gouger", "Ripper", "Eviscerator", "Sabretooth"
  • Formicid + 27 Translocations = "Teletunneler"
  • Gargoyle + 27 Invocations + Jiyva = "Rockslime"
  • Gargoyle + 27 Fire Magic = "Molten"
  • Ghoul + 27 Fire Magic = "Searing Wretch"
  • Human + 27 Fighting + Makhleb = "Hell Knight"
  • Merfolk + 27 Long Blades = "Swordfish"
  • Mummy + 27 Unarmed Combat = "Pharaoh"
  • Mummy + 27 Fire Magic = "Highly Combustible"
  • Mummy + 27 Invocations + Nemelex Xobeh = "Forbidden One"
  • Mummy + 27 Invocations + Uskayaw = "Necrodancer"
  • Mummy + 27 Invocations + Gozag = "Royal Mummy"
  • Octopode + 27 Unarmed Combat = "Crusher"
  • Spriggan + 27 Necromancy = "Petite Mort"
  • Spriggan + 21 or more Shields = "Defender"
  • Troll + 21 or more Conjurations = "Wallbreaker"
  • Troll + 27 Armour = "Iron Troll"
  • Vine Stalker + 27 Necromancy = "Corpseflower"
  • Vine Stalker + 27 Invocations + Nemelex Xobeh = "Black Lotus"
  • Vine Stalker + 27 Invocations + Dithmenos = "Nightshade"

History

  • Prior to 0.32, certain gods had different Invocations titles:
    • Yredelemnul did not use a standard piety system, so its titles were based on Invocations skill. These titles were Traitor (penance), Tainted (0-7), Torchbearer (8-11), Fey <foo> (12-15), Black Crusader (16-19), Sculptor of Flesh (20-23), Harbinger of Death (24-26), Grim Reaper (27).
    • Beogh's titles were Apostate, Messenger, Proselytiser, Priest, Missionary, Evangelist, Apostle, and Messiah.
    • Dithmenos' titles were Ember, Gloomy, Darkened, Extinguished, Caliginous, Umbral, Hand of Shadow, and Eternal Night.
    • Kikubaaqudgha's titles were Tormented, Purveyor of Pain, Scholar of Death, Merchant of Misery, Artisan of Death, Dealer of Despair, Black Sun, and Lord of Darkness.
  • Prior to 0.31, 27 Evocations gave the "Talismancer" title.
Also, you could get the following custom titles while playing as a Meteoran:
27 Maces & Flails = "Morning/Evening Star" (based on time of day)
27 Ranged Weapons = "Shooting Star"
27 Air Magic = "Meteorite"
27 Earth Magic = "Rock Star"
27 Translocations = "Black Hole"
27 Invocations + Dithmenos = "Starry Night"
27 Invocations + Zin = "Silver Star"
27 Invocations + Lugonu = "Wretched Star" (briefly present in trunk)
And one title from an Ogre:
Any level of spellcasting = Ogre mage
Additionally, a few species-specific "Fooish Child" titles were added in 0.31.
  • Prior to 0.27, Nagas had different Walking titles as they slid instead of slither.

Removed skill titles:

Skill Level 1-7 Level 8-14 Level 15-20 Level 21-26 Level 27
Traps & Doors Scout Disarmer Vigilant Perceptive Dungeon Master
Stabbing Miscreant Blackguard Backstabber Cutthroat Politician
Charms Charmwright Infuser Anointer Gracecrafter Miracle Worker
Bows Shooter Archer Marksfoo Crack Shot Merry Foo
Crossbows Bolt Thrower Quickloader Sharpshooter Sniper Foo Arbalest
Slings Vandal Slinger Whirler Slingshot Foo Catapult
Transmutation Changer Transmogrifier Alchemist Malleable Shapeless Foo
Poison Magic Stinger Tainter Polluter Contaminator Envenomancer

Removed Invocations titles:

God Penance ...... *..... **.... ***... ****.. *****. ******
Pakellas* Reactionary Apprentice Inquisitive Experimenter Inventor Pioneer Brilliant Grand Gadgeteer

* For Pakellas, these titles were given when Evocations was the highest skill.

rawPage:
{{version032}}
Your character will be given a '''skill title''' based on their current skill set. To determine the title, a character's skills are placed into five tiers: Lvl 1-7, 8-14, 15-20, 21-26, and 27. Your character's title is determined by their highest skill -- any time a different skill surpasses your current highest skill, your title will change to reflect it. Your title will also change when your current highest skill reaches a new tier. The first skill to reach level 27 will determine your character's final title.

''** Title determined by (upper) body size: Weightless (Djinn), Fly (Spriggans), Feather (Kobolds and Tengu), Light (Deep Elves), Middle (Humans and everyone else not included in other categories), Cruiser (species with torso smaller than lower body, ie. Nagas and Armataurs), and Heavy (Oni and Trolls).''

==Custom Titles==
Certain species/skill combinations result in custom titles:

*[[Armataur]] + 27 Invocations + [[Good god]] = "Holy Roller"

*[[Deep Elf]] + 27 Ranged Weapons = "[[deep elf master archer|Master Archer]]"

*[[Draconian]] + 27 Invocations + Good god = "[[pearl dragon|Pearl Dragon]]"
*[[Felid]] + Unarmed Combat =  "Scratcher", "Gouger", "Ripper", "Eviscerator", "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smilodon Sabretooth]"
*[[Formicid]] + 27 Translocations = "Teletunneler"
*[[Gargoyle]] + 27 Invocations + [[Jiyva]] = "[[Rockslime]]"
*[[Gargoyle]] + 27 Fire Magic = "Molten"

==History==
*Prior to [[0.32]], certain gods had different Invocations titles:
**[[Yredelemnul]] did not use a standard piety system, so its titles were based on Invocations skill. These titles were Traitor (penance), Tainted (0-7), Torchbearer (8-11), Fey <foo> (12-15), Black Crusader (16-19), Sculptor of Flesh (20-23), Harbinger of Death (24-26), Grim Reaper (27).
**[[Beogh]]'s titles were Apostate, Messenger, Proselytiser, Priest, Missionary, Evangelist, Apostle, and Messiah.
**[[Dithmenos]]' titles were Ember, Gloomy, Darkened, Extinguished, Caliginous, Umbral, Hand of Shadow, and Eternal Night.
**[[Kikubaaqudgha]]'s titles were Tormented, Purveyor of Pain, Scholar of Death, Merchant of Misery, Artisan of Death, Dealer of Despair, Black Sun, and Lord of Darkness.
*Prior to [[0.31]], 27 Evocations gave the "Talismancer" title.
:Also, you could get the following custom titles while playing as a [[Meteoran]]:
::27 Maces & Flails = "[[Morningstar|Morning]]/[[Eveningstar|Evening]] Star" (based on time of day)
::27 Ranged Weapons = "Shooting Star"
::27 Air Magic = "Meteorite"
::27 Earth Magic = "Rock Star"
::27 Translocations = "Black Hole"
::27 Invocations + [[Dithmenos]] = "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Starry_Night Starry Night]"
::27 Invocations + [[Zin]] = "[[silver star|Silver Star]]"
::27 Invocations + [[Lugonu]] = "[[wretched star|Wretched Star]]" (briefly present in [[trunk]])
:And one title from an [[Ogre]]:
::Any level of spellcasting = [[Ogre mage]]
:Additionally, a few species-specific "Fooish Child" titles were added in 0.31.
*Prior to [[0.27]], [[Naga]]s had different Walking titles as they slid instead of slither.
